data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Subarnapur, Odisha, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Subarnapur, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Subarnapur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Subarnapur.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 194 believers in Subarnapur to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Kusta people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 194 believers in Subarnapur.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Subarnapur, Odisha, India from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary:
the county of Subarnapur, Odisha, India has a population of 17,600.

We estimate Subarnapur has 194 people who might know Jesus, 214 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,193 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the county of Subarnapur to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.
